info.title: Top News
info.body: Stay informed with our top news feature, which assembles a list of the most popular stories from around the world. Choose from politics, science, entertainment and much more.

info.title: Choose The Tone
info.body: Filter your news by positivity or negativity. Whether you want to read uplifting news, want to stay informed about world's problems or anything in between, we got you covered.

info.title: Get The Gist
info.body: No time? No prblem. Read bite size summaries of the most important news stories of the day and save yourself some time. Powered by ChatGPT.

info.title: Compare And Contrast
info.body: Explore different perspectives on the same story with our multi-source news feature. See how different news outlets are covering the same event, so you can gain a complete view
